project_overview: Tasty Tales is a dynamic recipe-sharing platform where users can explore, contribute, and manage delicious food recipes. The platform features a user-friendly admin dashboard and a parcel management system for food or ingredient deliveries.
challenges_and_solutions: A major challenge was to create a seamless experience for managing food deliveries and recipe contributions. The solution was building a comprehensive admin dashboard that allows easy tracking of deliveries and user contributions, ensuring smooth workflow.
future_plans: I am plan to introduce a mobile app for both iOS and Android, implement AI for personalized recipe suggestions, and integrate real-time delivery tracking.
